column5: For anyone who has fished Horwood lake, is there cell coverage in that area? TIA.

I remember that cell service was not very good when we went there, but that was several years ago. The bigger question would be, "Why Horwood?"Our experience there was less than stellar, to be kind.FrankLeigh

I live in the area and fish it multiple times per year there is no cell service at all on the lake. Maybe right at horwood lake lodge as I have never gone all the way up there, but there is no coverage at all on the lake. Fishing is generally pretty good there.
